channel.title: Connect to Data Sources on Dremio Modernization Workshop
channel.description: Recent content in Connect to Data Sources on Dremio Modernization Workshop

item.title: Connect to S3
item.description: Connect to S3 Data Source From the Dremio Home Screen Click the + icon next to “Data Lakes” From the “Add Data Lake” box, click Amazon S3 From the “New Amazon S3 Source” Add the following information to the General tab: Name: [AWS S3 Modernization Workshop] AWS Access Key:Go to IAM console and look for dremio-user,create access key under security credentials tab and use it AWS Secret Key: Go to IAM console and look for dremio-user,create secret key under security credentials tab and use it Click Save.
